Docs.summary: Defines a service that can be obtained from an for the purpose of starting a new workflow instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Guid StartWorkflow(class System.Type workflowType, class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, object> namedArgumentValues) cil managed

Docs.param: A <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryBase.Dictionary%2A> that contains runtime parameters for the workflow.
Docs.summary: Starts the workflow of designated <xref:System.Type> providing the running instance with a <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryBase.Dictionary%2A> that contains runtime parameters.
Docs.returns: The instance ID of the workflow that is started.
Docs.value: The instance ID of the workflow that is started.
